pageProps.title: Why College Doesn’t Matter for Getting a Job in Tech
pageProps.metaDesc:
For many years, graduating from a top-tier college, such as the Indian Institutes of Technology (IITs) in India, was considered the key to getting a good job in the tech industry. However, with the increasing demand for tech jobs and the rise of remote work, the importance of college has diminished in the eyes of tech companies. Nowadays, your ambition and your will to learn is all that matters.
This article will discuss the reasons why college is no longer a determining factor in getting a job in tech, and what you can do to increase your chances of landing a dream offer.
